original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: tena samayena buddhaḥ bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Tena kho pana samayena thullanandā bhikkhunī samaggena saṅghena ukkhittaṁ ariṭṭhaṁ bhikkhuṁ gaddhabādhipubbaṁ anuvattati.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena thullanandā bhikkhunī samaggena saṅghena ukkhittam ariṭṭham bhikkhum gaddha bādhipubbam anuvattati

original: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā …pe… tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
analyzed: yāḥ tāḥ bhikkhuniyaḥ appicchāḥ pe tāḥ ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti

original: “kathañhi nāma ayyā thullanandā samaggena saṅghena ukkhittaṁ ariṭṭhaṁ bhikkhuṁ gaddhabādhipubbaṁ anuvattissatī”ti …pe…
analyzed: katham hi nāma ayyā thullanandā samaggena saṅghena ukkhittam ariṭṭham bhikkhum gaddha bādhi pubbam anuvattissati iti pe

original: “saccaṁ kira, bhikkhave, thullanandā bhikkhunī samaggena saṅghena ukkhittaṁ ariṭṭhaṁ bhikkhuṁ gaddhabādhipubbaṁ anuvattatī”ti?
analyzed: saccam kira bhikkhave thullanandā bhikkhunī samaggena saṅghena ukkhittam ariṭṭham bhikkhum gaddha bādhipubbam anuvattati iti

original: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, thullanandā bhikkhunī samaggena saṅghena ukkhittaṁ ariṭṭhaṁ bhikkhuṁ gaddhabādhipubbaṁ anuvattissati.
analyzed: katham hi nāma bhikkhave thullanandā bhikkhunī samaggena saṅghena ukkhittam ariṭṭham bhikkhum gaddha bādhipubbam anuvattissati
na ita bhikkhave appasannānam vā pasādāya pe

original: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddisantu—
analyzed: evam ca pana bhikkhave bhikkhuniyaḥ imam sikkhāpadam uddisantu

original: “Yā pana bhikkhunī samaggena saṅghena ukkhittaṁ bhikkhuṁ dhammena vinayena satthusāsanena
analyzed: yā pana bhikkhunī samaggena saṅghena ukkhittam bhikkhum dhammena vinayena satthu sāsanena

original: anādaraṁ appaṭikāraṁ akatasahāyaṁ tamanuvatteyya, sā bhikkhunī bhikkhunīhi evamassa vacanīyā—
analyzed: an ādaram ap paṭikāram a kata sahāyam tam anuvatteyya sā bhikkhunī bhikkhunīhi evam assa vacanīyā

original: ‘eso kho, ayye, bhikkhu samaggena saṅghena ukkhitto dhammena vinayena satthusāsanena anādaro appaṭikāro akatasahāyo, māyye, etaṁ bhikkhuṁ anuvattī’ti.
analyzed: esaḥ kho ayye bhikkhu samaggena saṅghena ukkhittaḥ dhammena vinayena satthu sāsanena anādaraḥ appaṭikāraḥ a kata sahāyaḥ mā āyye etam bhikkhum anuvattī ti

original: Evañca sā bhikkhunī bhikkhunīhi vuccamānā tatheva paggaṇheyya, sā bhikkhunī bhikkhunīhi yāvatatiyaṁ samanubhāsitabbā tassa paṭinissaggāya.
analyzed: evam ca sā bhikkhunī bhikkhunīhi vuccamānā tathā iva paggaṇheyya sā bhikkhunī bhikkhunīhi yāvatatiyam samanubhāsitabbā tassa paṭinissaggāya

original: Yāvatatiyañce samanubhāsiyamānā taṁ paṭinissajjeyya, iccetaṁ kusalaṁ.
No ce paṭinissajjeyya, ayampi pārājikā hoti asaṁvāsā ukkhittānuvattikā”ti.
analyzed: no ce paṭinissajjeyya ayam pi pārājikā hoti a sa vāsā ukkhitta anuvattikā ti
pe ayam imasmin atthe adhippetā bhikkhunī iti
samāna sa vāsakaḥ samāna sīmāyam ṭhitaḥ

original: āpattiyā adassane vā appaṭikamme vā appaṭinissagge vā ukkhitto.
analyzed: āpattiyāḥ a dassane vā appaṭikamme vā appaṭinissagge vā ukkhittaḥ

original: saṅghaṁ vā gaṇaṁ vā puggalaṁ vā kammaṁ vā nādiyati.
analyzed: saṅgham vā gaṇam vā puggalam vā kammam vā na ādiyati

original: So tehi saddhiṁ natthi, tena vuccati akatasahāyoti.
analyzed: so tehi saddhim na atthi tena vuccati a kata sahāyaḥ ti

original: yaṁdiṭṭhiko so hoti yaṅkhantiko yaṁruciko, sāpi taṁdiṭṭhikā hoti taṅkhantikā taṁrucikā.
analyzed: yadiṭṭhiko so hoti yaṅkhantikaḥ yaruciko sā api tad iṭṭhikā hoti taṅkhantikā tarucikā

original: aññāhi bhikkhunīhi. Yā passanti yā suṇanti tāhi vattabbā—
analyzed: aññāhi bhikkhunīhi yā passanti yā suṇanti tāhi vattabbā

original: “eso kho, ayye, bhikkhu samaggena saṅghena ukkhitto dhammena vinayena satthusāsanena anādaro appaṭikāro akatasahāyo.
analyzed: esaḥ kho ayye bhikkhu samaggena saṅghena ukkhittaḥ dhammena vinayena satthu sāsanena anādaraḥ appaṭikāraḥ a kata sahāyaḥ
sā bhikkhunī saṅgha majjham pi ākaḍḍhitvā vattabbā

original: “eso kho, ayye, bhikkhu samaggena saṅghena ukkhitto dhammena vinayena satthusāsanena anādaro appaṭikāro akatasahāyo.
analyzed: esaḥ kho ayye bhikkhu samaggena saṅghena ukkhittaḥ dhammena vinayena satthu sāsanena anādaraḥ appaṭikāraḥ a kata sahāyaḥ

original: Ayaṁ itthannāmā bhikkhunī samaggena saṅghena ukkhittaṁ bhikkhuṁ dhammena vinayena satthusāsanena anādaraṁ appaṭikāraṁ akatasahāyaṁ tamanuvattati, sā taṁ vatthuṁ na paṭinissajjati.
analyzed: ayam itthannāmā bhikkhunī samaggena saṅghena ukkhittam bhikkhum dhammena vinayena satthu sāsanena anādaram appaṭikāram a kata sahāyam tam anuvattati sā tam vatthum na paṭinissajjati

original: Yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṁ, saṅgho itthannāmaṁ bhikkhuniṁ samanubhāseyya tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya.
analyzed: yadi saṅghassa pattakalla saṅghaḥ itthannāmam bhikkhunim samanubhāseyya tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya

original: Ayaṁ itthannāmā bhikkhunī samaggena saṅghena ukkhittaṁ bhikkhuṁ dhammena vinayena satthusāsanena anādaraṁ appaṭikāraṁ akatasahāyaṁ tamanuvattati.
analyzed: ayam itthannāmā bhikkhunī samaggena saṅghena ukkhittam bhikkhum dhammena vinayena satthu sāsanena anādaram appaṭikāram a kata sahāyam tam anuvattati

original: Saṅgho itthannāmaṁ bhikkhuniṁ samanubhāsati tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya.
analyzed: saṅghaḥ itthannāmam bhikkhunim samanubhāsati tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya

original: Yassā ayyāya khamati itthannāmāya bhikkhuniyā samanubhāsanā tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya, sā tuṇhassa;
analyzed: yassa ayyāya khamati itthannāmāya bhikkhuniyā samanubhāsanā tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya sā tuṇhassa
dutiyam pi etam attham vadāmi pe
tatiyam pi etam attham vadāmi pe

original: Samanubhaṭṭhā saṅghena itthannāmā bhikkhunī tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya.
analyzed: samanubhaṭṭhā saṅghena itthannāmā bhikkhunī tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya

original: Khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṁ dhārayāmī’”ti.
analyzed: khamati saṅghassa tasmai tuṇhī evam etam dhārayāmi iti

original: seyyathāpi nāma puthusilā dvedhā bhinnā appaṭisandhikā hoti, evameva bhikkhunī yāvatatiyaṁ
analyzed: sā iyyathā api nāma puthusilā dvedhā bhinnā appaṭisandhikā hoti evam eva bhikkhunī

original: samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjantī assamaṇī hoti asakyadhītā. Tena vuccati pārājikā hotīti.
analyzed: samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjantī a ssamaṇī hoti a sakya dhītā tena vuccati pārājikā hoti iti

original: saṁvāso nāma ekakammaṁ ekuddeso samasikkhatā. Eso saṁvāso nāma.
analyzed: savāsaḥ nāma eka kammam eka uddeso samasikkhata eso savāsaḥ nāma

original: So tāya saddhiṁ natthi. Tena vuccati asaṁvāsāti.
analyzed: saḥ tāya saddhim na atthi tena vuccati asavāsā ati

original: Dhammakamme dhammakammasaññā na paṭinissajjati, āpatti pārājikassa.
analyzed: dhamma kamme dhamma kamma saññā na paṭinissajjati āpatti pārājikassa

original: Dhammakamme vematikā na paṭinissajjati, āpatti pārājikassa.
analyzed: dhamma kamme vematikā na paṭinissajjati āpatti pārājikassa

original: Dhammakamme adhammakammasaññā na paṭinissajjati, āpatti pārājikassa.
analyzed: dhamma kamme adhamma kamma saññā na paṭinissajjati āpatti pārājikassa
adhamma kamme dhamma kamma saññā āpatti dukkaṭassa
